ApplicationDescription: Reserve times for tutoring, seminars and workshops.
NavigationFiltersTitle: Filter time slots on different aspects.
HeaderLabelNoGroupMembership: Not a member of any group
NoTimeSlotsDescription: There are no available slots published with the selected filters.
SlotListingHeaderInstructor: Listing {{slots}} slots with you as instructor from {{from}} {{to}}:
SlotReservationTimeInPast: Time for this slot has passed.
SlotReservationGroupIsReserved: Your group is reserved for this slot.
SlotReservationIndividualIsReserved: You are reserved for this slot.
ReserveSlotModalLabelMessage: Questions or feedback to the instructor:
ReserveSlotModalLabelMessageInvalidFeedb: Please enter a message in the text area.
ReserveSlotModalLabelReservationGroupNoM: Not a member of a group
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupNoticeTitle: This is a reservation for a whole group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupNoticeText: When you reserve this time, you and all the members of the group will get a confirmation sent to your Canvas Inbox.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupConnectNoticeTit: This time slot is reserved with another group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgGroupConnectNoticeTex: When you reserve this time, you and all the members of the group will get a confirmation sent to your Canvas Inbox. Both groups will also get instructions on how to prepare for the meeting.
ReserveSlotModalMsgUserNotInGroupTitle: You are not a member of a group.
ReserveSlotModalMsgUserNotInGroupText: To reserve this time slot you must be a member of a group. Please contact an instructor or examiner.
ReserveSlotModalMsgErrorLoadingText: The server did not respond. Please try again later.
CancelSlotReservationModalMsgNotCancelab: You can no longer cancel this reservation. Please contact the instructor for urgent matters.
CancelSlotReservationModalMsgGroupNotice: This is a reservation for a whole group.
When you cancel the reservation, the whole group is affected. A confirmation message will be sent to the group in Canvas Inbox.
CancelSlotReservationApiResponseNotCance: Cancellation time has passed, not possible to cancel.
OffCanvasDetailsManualMessageButtonTitle: Send a message to all reserved
ConversationRobotManualMessageSendingNot: The message will be sent from a system account in Canvas. You will be included in the receivers list so you're notified on replies and able to make replies yourself in Canvas Inbox.
ConversationRobotManualMessageSuccessRes: Message has been sent in Canvas.
ConversationRobotManualMessageErrorMaxLi: Number of recipients ({{count}}) exceed limit, which is {{max}}. Try and make a Course Announcement instead.
ConversationRobotManualMessageErrorRobot: The system is configured not to send any messages.
GeneralErrorMessageMissingAdminAccess: You must have administrator privileges to access this page.
InstructorEditSlotModalReservationsNoRes: There are no reservations for this slot.
InstructorEditSlotModalAlertWarningConte: Please note: You will have to manually message the people or groups if you make any changes, no communication is sent automatically.
InstructorDeleteSlotModalAlertWarningCon: There are reservations for this timeslot! You will have to manually message the people or groups if you delete this timeslot, no communication is sent automatically.
AdminHelpPaneDescription: This page is intentionally left blank for the moment.
AdminCanvasHelpPaneDescription:
Configuration for the course in Canvas where the tool is used.

If there are many groupsets and a student could be a member of many groups in different groupsets, you can filter the valid groupsets.

If no particular groupset is selected, then all are valid.
AdminCourseDescription: Types of time slots available in this Canvas course
AdminCourseHelpPaneContent:
A time slot must have a type before it can be created.

The type controls if it's a group or individual slot, max reservations, texts in messages etc.
AdminCourseModalDeleteNotDeletableText: This type is connected to existing time slots in this course and can not be deleted.
AdminCourseModalLabelMaxNumber: Number of seats per time slot
AdminCourseModalLabelMaxPerType: Max reservations in total for this type
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageIsMandatory: Message field is mandatory when reserving a slot
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageAllWhenFull: Connect groups with a separate message when all seats are reserved
AdminCourseModalLabelMessageCcInstructor: Send a copy of all messages to the instructor
AdminSegmentHelpPaneContent:
Segments are used for making filtering slot types easier for the user. If you create a segment then every slot type must have a segment.

If there are existing slot types when you create a first segment, they will be attached to this segment. To edit the attached segment, edit the slot type.
AdminSegmentModalAlertFirstSegmentConten: You are creating a first segment. Existing slot types will be assigned to this segment. You can change it later.
AdminSegmentModalDeleteReplaceAlertText: This segment is connected to slot types. Choose another segment to replace with, as all slot types must have a segment.
AdminSegmentModalDeleteFinalAlertText: This is the only segment in this course. If you delete it, all slot types will be updated to not have any segment connected.
AdminInstructorHelpPaneContent:
Instructors are people in this Canvas course with the Examiner or Teacher role.

Only people in this list can be added as instructors to time slots in this course.
AdminInstructorModalAlertPrimaryContent: Only people enrolled in this Canvas course with Examiner or Teacher role can be added as instructors.
AdminInstructorModalAlertAllAddedContent: There are no more persons to add. Everyone with the role Examiner or Teacher in this course are already added.
AdminInstructorModalDeleteReplaceAlertTe: The instructor is connected to time slots in this course. You can choose to replace with a new instructor, or let the present instructor remain. Note that no new time slots can be created with this instructor.
AdminLocationDescription: Rooms and locations connected to this course
AdminLocationHelpPaneContent:
Rooms, places, locations. They are used for telling where the activity is held. It can also be a digital location, like a Zoom meeting.

Please note that all locations are shared in the same installation, so one room can be added to this course and still be referenced from another course.

If you edit the description or link, this will change for everyone using it.

If you delete it, it will only be deleted from this course.
AdminLocationModalLabelMaxIndividualsNot: If this number is lower than the general number of seats available for a type of slot, this number will be the maximum seats for the time slot using this place.
AdminLocationModalDeleteReplaceAlertText: This place is used for time slots in this course. You can replace it with another, or choose to keep it as it is. However, no new time slots can be created with this location.
AdminExportsHelpPaneDescription:
Click on a linked definition of data to download a tab separated CSV file.

To open in Excel, create a blank sheet and use the Data tab and From Text/CSV.
AdminExportsReservationsAllGroups: All group reservations with details about time, group name, course and instructor
SystemBackendErrorLtiLaunchMessage: The tool must be started from within a Canvas course, to get the correct LTI context.
SystemBackendErrorLtiLaunchSessionMessag: You must enable third party cookies for this site in your web browser settings, otherwise we can't create a secure session for you.
